metadata.name: Reflection 01
metadata.description:
Looping video portrait. A woman gazes into her own reflection as the moon rises behind her. As the water gently ripples and washes over her reflection, her image contorts and shifts.

A moody and mesmeric video piece exploring aspects of identity and image.

Using rippling water and the ocean as a surface, these portraits shift and contort the identity of the gazer, in a dream-like haze. They are romantic, hypnotic, whilst also sometimes eerie.


1920x1080p / 39 seconds on loop
